projects.title: AI-Powered Code Reviewer
projects.description: An intelligent code-review automation tool built using Node.js, React.js, and MongoDB, integrated with Gemini AI. Designed to help developers review pull requests faster with AI-generated insights.

projects.title: Twitter Clone
projects.description: A clean and responsive Twitter-style UI clone built using only HTML and CSS. Designed to replicate the look and feel of Twitter’s interface with modern styling, smooth layout, and pixel-perfect component design.

projects.title: GitHub Widget
projects.description: Track your GitHub stats — commits, contributions, Heatmap, streaks, PRs, issues, and repo insights — all beautifully displayed on your iOS home screen using Scriptable with dynamic layouts and theme support.
